meanings.definition: The act of making something void or empty.
meanings.sent1: Her voidance of the old contract left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent2: The voidance of the room made it feel spacious and airy.
meanings.sent3: The magician's voidance of the hat trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The voidance of his promises left her feeling abandoned.
meanings.sent5: The voidance of the clutter made the room feel brand new.

meanings.definition: The state of being void or empty.
meanings.sent1: The voidance of the jar made it useless for storage.
meanings.sent2: The voidance of the field left it barren and desolate.
meanings.sent3: The voidance of the fridge after the party was comical.
meanings.sent4: The voidance of her heart made her feel lonely.
meanings.sent5: The voidance of the wallet made him panic.
